data.description:
Senator Patty Murray is accepting applications for a paid, full-time communications internship for the summer semester. Communications interns work closely with the communications team and help compile daily press clips, closely follow the news, draft press releases and other materials, and work on a variety of other projects. Strong candidates are self-motivated, pay close attention to detail, have strong writing skills, and thrive in a fast-paced environment. Undergraduate students and recent graduates are invited to apply. State ties are a plus, and the internship will start at the end of May and end in August.

The application deadline is Sunday, March 15th, 2026.
